title: How to Clean the Steam Nozzle of a Coffee Machine

steps.headline: Wipe the steam nozzles after each use.
steps.description: For a better clean, soak the nozzles in hot water to loosen the milk residue.

steps.headline: Turn the steam wands on both before and after use.
steps.description: This will help to release the condensation and milk reside build-up.

steps.headline: Remove steam nozzles with adjustable crescent.
steps.description: Soak them at the end of a service to prevent blocking. Clogged jets can be unblocked using a paperclip.

text: Wipe the steam nozzles after each use. For a better clean, soak the nozzles in hot water to loosen the milk residue. Turn the steam wands on both before and after use. This will help to release the condensation and milk reside build-up. Remove steam nozzles with adjustable crescent. Soak them at the end of a service to prevent blocking. Clogged jets can be unblocked using a paperclip.
